title: 820-2530 - Only powers sometimes. GPU get's hot.
message:
I have a 2530 that will only power one every now and then.

Once the power button is pressed though, the GPU get's hot. All power rails I usually measure are present.'

Green/Orange light working correctly. Charges bettery.

VCore missing, but it isn't reaching an S0 state anyway.

title: 820-2530 - Only powers sometimes. GPU get's hot.
message: So it chimes and boots sometimes? If yes then I would not continue with this board.

title: 820-2530 - Only powers sometimes. GPU get's hot.
message:
Thanks Duke.
What's wrong with the board that you would trash it?

title: 820-2530 - Only powers sometimes. GPU get's hot.
message: It could be anything, probably something MCP related.

title: 820-2530 - Only powers sometimes. GPU get's hot.
message:
Thanks Duke.

Close the thread please. This ones gone on the donor pile.
